Random Astronomy Question Generator

In the course of my undergraduate studies, I eventually came to the realization that a good number of textbook astronomy problems followed a simple formula. This is my attempt to test the validity of that formula.

Disclaimer: this is intended as affectionate humor and is not meant to disparage the hard work of textbook authors and professors.

Give me some homework!

"Assuming [thing in space] is [unreasonable assumption], derive [something irrelevant]."
